hero.subtitle: DOORS puts control back where it belongs ‚Äî in the hands of buyers and sellers.
hero.description: No agents. No commissions. Just you, your personal Doors assistant and a platform that makes buying or selling your home faster, clearer and completely stress-free.
hero.freeDemo: Try free demo. No account needed

buyer.title: How many times have you felt that changing homes is more difficult than it should be?
buyer.subtitle: Buying a home should be a pleasant experience ‚Äî but it often turns into a marathon of frustration and wasted time.
problemList: Contracts full of "fine print" and hidden traps
Long waiting times for responses or viewings
Viewings that don't match your needs
buyer.conclusion: In a complicated market, DOORS brings back simplicity.
buyer.solutionTitle: Your personal real estate assistant, always available and always honest.
buyer.solutionDescription: DOORS eliminates the chaos. Our empathetic and professional assistant listens, understands your needs and instantly finds properties that truly match your preferences ‚Äî no intermediaries, no pressure, no commissions.
buyer.beforeDoorsTitle: Before DOORS ‚Äî The experience with the real estate market

realBenefits.title: Real benefits:
items: Instant recommendations based on your criteria
No spam calls or pushy agents
Optional expert services for complete security

seller.title: Have you tried selling before? Then you already know how hard it is.
seller.subtitle: Selling a home seems simple ‚Äî until you actually try. Most property owners face the same exhausting obstacles:
problemList: Poor communication and lack of real feedback
No clear answers to "Why isn't my property selling?"
And yes... high commissions that reduce your profit
seller.solutionDescription: On DOORS, everything starts with a simple conversation. The DOORS assistant interviews you about your property ‚Äî or you can enter the details directly. Then, you upload the photos, and in seconds DOORS creates a complete optimized listing, ready to publish, with professional text and suitable images ‚Äî and publishes it instantly.

realBenefits.title: Real benefits:
items: 100% free for sellers ‚Äî no fees, no commisions
Listings created automatically from voice or text

steps.text: Tell the assistant what you're looking for ‚Äî it guides you through clear questions.
Get instant matches, tailored to your needs.
Choose your favorites and schedule up to 4 guaranteed viewings.
Visit, compare and decide in peace ‚Äî no pressure, no rush.

tryDemo.title: Meet your DOORS real estate agent ‚Äî no account, no card.
tryDemo.description: Start a real conversation and see how DOORS understands your lifestyle and preferences.

seller.title: Real-time analytics that accelerate sales
seller.subtitle: Understand your listing. Improve results.
seller.description: DOORS gives you access to live statistics, so you know exactly how your listing is performing:
analytics: See how many buyers have viewed or saved your listing
Discover which details attract or discourage interest
Compare your price with similar properties in the area
Get improvement suggestions from the DOORS assistant
seller.conclusion: Sometimes, a small change can make all the difference. With DOORS, you know exactly what to improve and why ‚Äî to sell faster and at the best price.

tryDemo.title: Create a complete listing in 60 seconds ‚Äî no account, no costs.
tryDemo.description: Experience the entire process: voice interview + photo upload ‚Üí see the listing generated by DOORS, ready for publication.

about.title: Make the right decision with confidence ‚Äî backed by professionals.
about.subtitle: Found something you like ‚Äî but not sure it's "the one"?
about.description: DOORS gives you access to a complete suite of independent professional services that help you make smarter and safer decisions:

services.title: Technical inspection
services.description: discover the real condition of the property

services.title: Property evaluation
services.description: find out the real market value

services.title: Market analysis
services.description: compare similar offers and price trends

about.conclusion: Enjoy your free time ‚Äî DOORS makes choosing your home simple, smart and safe.

buyer.title: Pay only for what truly matters.
buyer.subtitle: Activate your DOORS account for just ‚Ç¨19.99 and get 4 guaranteed viewings for your chosen properties.
buyer.guarantee: Didn't find the right home? Get a full refund for unused viewings ‚Äî no questions asked.

seller.title: List for free. Sell for free.
seller.subtitle: For sellers, DOORS is completely free.
features: No listing fees, no subscriptions, no commissions
You can list unlimited properties and keep 100% of the sale price
seller.highlights: üí° You sell. We help you sell smarter.

security.title: Safe, verified and completely transparent ‚Äî always.
security.description: All listings are verified, communication is direct, and your data is protected according to the latest GDPR standards. With DOORS, everything is clear ‚Äî from the first conversation to the final handshake.

tokens.question: What are tokens and how do they work?
tokens.answer: Tokens are virtual credits for AI interactions. You get them free at the start and can buy more anytime.

dataSafety.question: Is my data safe?
dataSafety.answer: Yes, all data is protected according to standards and is only shared with mentioned third parties.

buyerSeller.question: Can I use the platform as both a seller and a buyer?
buyerSeller.answer: Yes, the platform is designed for both roles and offers complete functionality for selling and buying properties.

whyDoors.question: Why choose DOORS and not a classic agency?
whyDoors.answer: DOORS offers complete transparency, reduced costs and immediate access to information, eliminating intermediaries and large commissions.
